next.name: Next JS
next.description: O Next.js é um framework poderoso e flexível para construir aplicações React.js. Ele permite que os desenvolvedores criem aplicações prontas para produção com facilidade, oferecendo uma base robusta e uma ampla gama de recursos já prontos para uso.

react.name: React JS
react.description: React.js: Uma biblioteca dinâmica para construir interfaces de usuário interativas com facilidade, usando componentes declarativos para um desenvolvimento web eficiente.

typescript.name: TypeScript
typescript.description: TypeScript: Enhances JavaScript with static typing for scalable, maintainable, and error-free web development

javascript.name: JavaScript
javascript.description: JavaScript: A versatile programming language for web development, enabling dynamic, interactive, and client-side functionality across diverse applications.

styled-components.name: Styled Components
styled-components.description: Styled Components: Empowers React developers with CSS-in-JS, enhancing component styling by encapsulating styles within components for robust, maintainable designs

sass.name: SASS
sass.description: Sass: A powerful CSS preprocessor offering features like variables, nesting, and mixins to streamline stylesheet authoring and enhance maintainability in web projects.

html.name: HTML
html.description: HTML: The foundation of web development, enabling creation of structured, semantic content for building user interfaces and presenting information across the web.

css.name: CSS
css.description: Cascading Style Sheets, a fundamental technology for web design, enabling customization of layout, typography, and visual presentation to enhance user experience.

jest.name: Jest
jest.description: A delightful JavaScript testing framework, providing a simple and intuitive testing experience for ensuring code quality and reliability in projects.
